content: {"name": "Food Now", "address": "14080 Palm Dr., Ste E, Desert Hot Springs, CA 92240", "city": "Desert Hot Springs", "state": "CA", "zip": "92240", "phone": "(760) 288-7878", "hours": "USDA Foods & Emergency Food Available Monday Through Thursday from 7:30 am \u2013 10:30am", "services": [], "website": "https://findfoodbank.org/map/", "notes": "Drive-Thru Food Distributions on Wednesdays and Thursdays from 7:30am \u2013 10:30am | Note:NEW CLIENTS MUST REGISTER FIRST.Clients need to register to receive services.MUST BRING PROOF OF RESIDENCY, PROOF OF INCOME, AND PROOF OF NUMBER OF DEPENDENTS IN HOUSEHOLD.", "latitude": 33.945806512584, "longitude": -116.498519320273, "source": "find_food_bank_ca", "food_bank": "FIND Food Bank"}
